Brilliant Strategy.name: Brilliant Strategy
Brilliant Strategy.flavor: You weave a skein of psionic magic, combining your alliesâ€™ talents into a single, unbeatable force.
Brilliant Strategy.target: One enemy you can see in the burst
Brilliant Strategy.effect: Until the end of your next turn, you and your allies gain a bonus to attack rolls against the target equal to the number of your allies adjacent to it. If the target drops to 0 hit points, you can use this power again during this encounter.
